alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:55PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sweetwater County through 530 PM MDT... At 454 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bitter Creek Rest Area, which is also 23 miles west of Wamsutter, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. Occasional gusts to 45 mph possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Sweetwater County, including the following locations... Bitter Creek, Tipton, Red Desert and Point Of Rocks. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 130 and 181. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
